Ansible.Contents:
---
- name: Create a symbolic link for registries.conf from host to VM
  hosts: localhost
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Create symbolic link with sudo from the host
      command: sudo ln -s /mnt/c/Users/dbfsi/.config/containers/registries.conf /etc/containers/registries.conf.d/999-podman-desktop-registries-from-host.conf
